sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Item, Header, Popup, Responsive } from 'semantic-ui-react';

class MenuBar extends React.Component {

  state = {
    popup: false
  }

  render() {

    const { item } = this.props;

    let content = item.availability ?
    <React.Fragment>
      <Responsive minWidth={Responsive.onlyTablet.minWidth}>
        <Item>
          <Item.Image src={item.image} />

          <Item.Content verticalAlign='middle'>
            <Popup on='hover' position='right center' size='large' hoverable flowing content={item.definition} trigger={<Item.Header as='a' onClick={ () => this.props.handleitemclick(item) }>{item.name}</Item.Header>} />
            <Item.Meta>{item.description}</Item.Meta>
          </Item.Content>

        </Item>
      </Responsive>
      <Responsive {...Responsive.onlyMobile}>
        <Item>
          <Item.Image src={item.image} />

          <Item.Content verticalAlign='middle'>
            <Item.Header as='a' onClick={ () => this.props.handleitemclick(item) }>{item.name}</Item.Header>
            <Item.Meta>{item.description}</Item.Meta>
          </Item.Content>

        </Item>
      </Responsive>
    </React.Fragment>

    :

    <React.Fragment>
      <Responsive minWidth={Responsive.onlyTablet.minWidth}>
        <Item>
          <Item.Image src={item.image} />

          <Item.Content verticalAlign='middle'>
            <Popup on='hover' position='right center' size='large' flowing content={item.definition} trigger={<Item.Header as='a' onClick={ () => this.props.handleitemclick(item) }>{item.name}</Item.Header>} />
            <Item.Meta>{item.description}</Item.Meta>
            <Item.Extra>{<Header as='h3' color='red'>Out of Stock</Header>}</Item.Extra>
          </Item.Content>
        </Item>
      </Responsive>
      <Responsive {...Responsive.onlyMobile}>
        <Item>
          <Item.Image src={item.image} />

          <Item.Content verticalAlign='middle'>
            <Item.Header as='a' onClick={ () => this.props.handleitemclick(item) }>{item.name}</Item.Header>
            <Item.Meta>{item.description}</Item.Meta>
            <Item.Extra>{<Header as='h3' color='red'>Out of Stock</Header>}</Item.Extra>
          </Item.Content>
        </Item>
      </Responsive>
    </React.Fragment>;

    return (
      <React.Fragment>
        {content}
      </React.Fragment>
    );
  }
}

export default MenuBar;
